articles.description: Two lucky winners will each win a pair of Apple AirPods Pro. Giveaway ends June 30. *Open to the US, Puerto Rico and Canada (excluding Quebec).
articles.content: We're celebrating the start of WWDC 2020 Monday by giving away a pair of Apple AirPod Pro earbuds to two grand prize winners! Apple's AirPods Pro have a compact, lightweight, noise-canceling and swea… [+602 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Bursztynsky
articles.title: Apple's next iPhone won't include a charger or headphones, top analyst predicts - CNBC
articles.description: In an effort to cut costs, Apple may not include a power adapter with new iPhone 12 and iPhone SE purchases, TF Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said in a note this week.
articles.content:
In an effort to cut costs, Apple may not include a power adapter with its upcoming iPhone models, TF Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said in a note this week. 
Kuo predicted in May that the company … [+888 chars]

articles.title: NASA-Designed Perfume Brings The Smell Of Outer Space To Earth - NDTV
articles.description: A fragrance that smells like outer space may soon be made available to the general public, years after it was developed to help astronauts get used to the smell of space.
articles.content:
It took four years to develop 'Eau de Space' - a fragrance that smells like outer space.
